version_description:
1、调整冒险主题部分关卡难度
2、修复冒险闯关任务不统计的问题
3、修复爬塔关卡金萝卜、全清奖杯的统计问题
4、修复扭蛋时间异常的错误
5、修复已拥有角色转换碎片的错误

Fixed a bug where Candy Race scores were not refreshed at the specified time
Fixed bug with pet collection mode settlement reward error
Optimized pet experience on iPhone11 and above devices
Fixed a bug where the name of the small radish was displayed incorrectly
Fixed some stutter issues

Fixed the bug that the pet icon is not displayed in some cases
Fixed a bug that could not be paid due to file name change

New stores, providing gift packages and special services;
Add two new skins;
Add a skin twisting machine;
Adjust the balance of adventure levels to reduce the difficulty of some levels;
Fix the bug that the pet upgrade deduction is incorrect

Add a new topic
New National Day event-amusement park battle
New role
Added two new skins
New character gashapon machine

v1.8.1
Fix some known bugs
v1.8.0
Add a new topic

New National Day event-amusement park battle
New role
Added two new skins
New character gashapon machine

Open New Year's events for a limited time
Buy one get one free for a limited time
Open the abo recycling bin for a limited time
Add two new carrots
Add two new gift bags
Optimize the release operation of pets in the level, and modify the guidance process
Update homepage background
Optimize the ad copy of the gem store
Show probability in the gashapon scene
Improve customer service system

Fix bugs related to customer service system
Adjust the content and probability of the gashapon machine
Cooperate with ios14.5 to update the advertising authority mechanism
Fix the issue of black screen in some cases
Accept the real-name anti-addiction system according to the regulations of the relevant state departments
